message.content:
Implement the following plan: # Fix Diff Viewer Column Layout ## Context The diff viewer in the Remediation tab displays unified diffs with jumbled columns - line numbers and +/- prefixes run together (e.g., `1-` instead of properly separated columns, `812` instead of `8 12`). The root cause is that the current flexbox layout with `min-width` isn't reliably enforcing fixed column widths. CSS Grid is the correct tool for this fixed-column tabular layout. ## Changes ### 1. `frontend/src/styles.css` (diff viewer section, ~lines 1399-1446) Switch `.diff-line` from flexbox to CSS Grid with explicit column sizing: | Class | Change | |---|---| | `.diff-line` | Replace `@apply flex` with `display: grid; grid-template-columns: 3rem 3rem 1.25rem 1fr;` | | `.diff-line-number` | Remove `min-width: 2.5rem` (redundant with grid column) | | `.diff-line-prefix` | Remove `min-width: 1rem` (redundant with grid column) | | `.diff-line-content` | Remove `flex: 1`, add `overflow: hidden` | ### 2. `frontend/src/components/DiffViewer.tsx` (lines 36-41) Add an empty prefix `` to header lines (`@@`) so all rows have exactly 4 children matching the 4 grid columns: ```tsx case "header": lineClass += " diff-line-header"; return (
// ← ADD THIS {line.content}
); ``` ## Verification 1. `cd frontend && bun run css:build` - rebuild Tailwind CSS 2. `bun run test` - ensure no regressions 3. `bun run lint` - pass linting 4. `bun run dev` - visually confirm: - Line numbers right-aligned in fixed-width columns - Old/new line numbers visually separated - Prefix (+/-) in its own column - `@@` header lines aligned with content lines - Long lines wrap within content column If you need specific details from before exiting plan mode (like exact code snippets, error messages, or content you generated), read the full transcript at: /Users/cedricteyton/.REDACTED.jsonl

planContent:
# Fix Diff Viewer Column Layout ## Context The diff viewer in the Remediation tab displays unified diffs with jumbled columns - line numbers and +/- prefixes run together (e.g., `1-` instead of properly separated columns, `812` instead of `8 12`). The root cause is that the current flexbox layout with `min-width` isn't reliably enforcing fixed column widths. CSS Grid is the correct tool for this fixed-column tabular layout. ## Changes ### 1. `frontend/src/styles.css` (diff viewer section, ~lines 1399-1446) Switch `.diff-line` from flexbox to CSS Grid with explicit column sizing: | Class | Change | |---|---| | `.diff-line` | Replace `@apply flex` with `display: grid; grid-template-columns: 3rem 3rem 1.25rem 1fr;` | | `.diff-line-number` | Remove `min-width: 2.5rem` (redundant with grid column) | | `.diff-line-prefix` | Remove `min-width: 1rem` (redundant with grid column) | | `.diff-line-content` | Remove `flex: 1`, add `overflow: hidden` | ### 2. `frontend/src/components/DiffViewer.tsx` (lines 36-41) Add an empty prefix `` to header lines (`@@`) so all rows have exactly 4 children matching the 4 grid columns: ```tsx case "header": lineClass += " diff-line-header"; return (
// ← ADD THIS {line.content}
); ``` ## Verification 1. `cd frontend && bun run css:build` - rebuild Tailwind CSS 2. `bun run test` - ensure no regressions 3. `bun run lint` - pass linting 4. `bun run dev` - visually confirm: - Line numbers right-aligned in fixed-width columns - Old/new line numbers visually separated - Prefix (+/-) in its own column - `@@` header lines aligned with content lines - Long lines wrap within content column

content.text: I'll implement the diff viewer column layout fix. Let me start by reading the relevant files.

content.thinking:
Now I have both files. Let me make the changes:

1. In `styles.css`: Switch `.diff-line` from flexbox to CSS Grid
2. In `DiffViewer.tsx`: Add empty prefix span to header lines

Let me make both edits.

content.text:
All done. Here's a summary of the changes:

**`frontend/src/styles.css`** — Switched `.diff-line` from flexbox to CSS Grid:
- `.diff-line`: Replaced `@apply flex` with `display: grid; grid-template-columns: 3rem 3rem 1.25rem 1fr;`
- `.diff-line-number`: Removed `min-width: 2.5rem` (grid column handles sizing)
- `.diff-line-prefix`: Removed `min-width: 1rem` (grid column handles sizing)
- `.diff-line-content`: Replaced `flex: 1` + `min-width: 0` with `overflow: hidden`

**`frontend/src/components/DiffViewer.tsx`** — Added an empty `<span className="diff-line-prefix" />` to header lines so all rows have exactly 4 children matching the 4 grid columns.

input.command:
git add frontend/src/components/DiffViewer.tsx frontend/src/styles.css frontend/dist/output.css && git commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
Fix diff viewer column layout with CSS Grid

Replace flexbox with CSS Grid on .diff-line to enforce fixed-width columns
for line numbers and +/- prefixes, preventing them from running together.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)" && git status
